2 Kings or 4 Kings__15.5__A leper: In punishment of his usurping the priestly function. 2 Par. 26.
2 Kings or 4 Kings__15.30__In the twentieth year of Joatham: That is, in the twentieth year, from the beginning of Joatham's reign. The sacred writer chooses rather to follow here this date than to speak of the years of Achaz, who had not yet been mentioned.
